Name: Engine
Description: An engine is a device that converts fuel to kinetic energy. This type is for all engines, including product lines such as the Rolls Royce Merlin.

Properties.Name: Designer
Properties.Description: The original designer of this engine

Properties.Name: Energy source
Properties.Description: The fuel (include oxygen) or batteries used by this engine

Properties.Name: First Ran
Properties.Description: The date on which this engine was first run

Properties.Name: Mass
Properties.Description: The dry mass (aka weight) of the engine

Properties.Name: Output Power
Properties.Description: The maximum power produced by this engine

Properties.Name: Variants
Properties.Description: Engines which are slight adaptations of this engine

Properties.Name: Category
Properties.Description: The category of engine. e.g Internal Combustion. Pulsejet
